urn:resource_type.urn:documentation: This resource allows for manage compute instances, e.g. creating virtual machines.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.compute.architecture
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: CPU Architecture of the instance: Enum{x86,x64}

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.compute.cores
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Number of virtual CPU cores assigned to the instance

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.compute.hostname
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Fully qualified DNS host name for the instance

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.compute.share
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Relative number of CPU shares for the instance

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.compute.memory
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Minimum RAM in gigabytes allocated to the instance

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.compute.state
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Current state of the instance: Enum{active, inactive, suspended, error}

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.compute.state.message
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Human-readable explanation of the current instance state

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: openstack.compute.name
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: The name of the virtual machine.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: openstack.compute.keyname
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: The name of the key to access the virtual machine.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: openstack.image.name
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: The name of the image.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: openstack.image.mindisk
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Minimum disk space required for this image.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: openstack.image.minram
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Minimum memory required for this image.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.networkinterface.address
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Internet Protocol(IP) network address (e.g. 192.168.0.1/24, fc00::/7) of the link

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.networkinterface.gateway
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Internet Protocol(IP) network address (e.g. 192.168.0.1/24, fc00::/7)

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.networkinterface.allocation
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Address mechanism: dynamic e.g. usesthe dynamic host configuration protocol,static e.g. uses user supplied static network configurations.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.storagelink.deviceid
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Device identifier as defined by the OCCI service provider.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.storagelink.mountpoint
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Point to where the storage is mounted in the guest OS.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.storagelink.state
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Current status of the instance.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.storagelink.state.message
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Human-readable explanation of the current instance state.

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.networkinterface.interface
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Identifier that relates the link to the link’s device interface

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.networkinterface.mac
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: MAC address associated with the link's device interface

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.networkinterface.state
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Current state of the instance: Enum{active, inactive, error}

urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:name: occi.networkinterface.message
urn1:attributeClassification.urn1:description: Human-readable explanation of the current instance state

urn:request.urn:template: <Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Kind> <term>compute</term> <schema>http://schema.ogf.org/occi/infrastructure#</schema> <title>1</title> <attribute name="occi.compute.cores"> <INTEGER>1</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.memory"> <DOUBLE>512.0</DOUBLE> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.state.message"> <STRING>Flavor name m1.tiny</STRING> </attribute> </Kind> </Category>

<Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Kind> <term>compute</term> <schema>http://schema.ogf.org/occi/infrastructure#</schema> <title>2</title> <attribute name="occi.compute.cores"> <INTEGER>1</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.memory"> <DOUBLE>2048.0</DOUBLE> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.state.message"> <STRING>Flavor name m1.small</STRING> </attribute> </Kind> </Category>

<Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Kind> <term>compute</term> <schema>http://schema.ogf.org/occi/infrastructure#</schema> <title>2c6f7dfe-c997-467a-8da9-2805d531d5b2</title> <attribute name="occi.compute.cores"> <INTEGER>2</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.memory"> <DOUBLE>8192.0</DOUBLE> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.state.message"> <STRING>Flavor name m1.DNS</STRING> </attribute> </Kind> </Category>

<Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Kind> <term>compute</term> <schema>http://schema.ogf.org/occi/infrastructure#</schema> <title>3</title> <attribute name="occi.compute.cores"> <INTEGER>2</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.memory"> <DOUBLE>4096.0</DOUBLE> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.state.message"> <STRING>Flavor name m1.medium</STRING> </attribute> </Kind> </Category>

<Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Kind> <term>compute</term> <schema>http://schema.ogf.org/occi/infrastructure#</schema> <title>4</title> <attribute name="occi.compute.cores"> <INTEGER>4</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.memory"> <DOUBLE>8192.0</DOUBLE> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.state.message"> <STRING>Flavor name m1.large</STRING> </attribute> </Kind> </Category>

<Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Kind> <term>compute</term> <schema>http://schema.ogf.org/occi/infrastructure#</schema> <title>5</title> <attribute name="occi.compute.cores"> <INTEGER>8</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.memory"> <DOUBLE>16384.0</DOUBLE> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.state.message"> <STRING>Flavor name m1.xlarge</STRING> </attribute> </Kind> </Category>

<Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Kind> <term>compute</term> <schema>http://schema.ogf.org/occi/infrastructure#</schema> <title>99444788-dda2-4dd4-8989-c665bd141534</title> <attribute name="occi.compute.cores"> <INTEGER>2</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.memory"> <DOUBLE>2048.0</DOUBLE> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.state.message"> <STRING>Flavor name CLEARWATER</STRING> </attribute> </Kind> </Category>

<Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Kind> <term>compute</term> <schema>http://schema.ogf.org/occi/infrastructure#</schema> <title>dbe7b223-d7d8-4729-ade0-7dbbdfa105ca</title> <attribute name="occi.compute.cores"> <INTEGER>4</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.memory"> <DOUBLE>8192.0</DOUBLE> </attribute> <attribute name="occi.compute.state.message"> <STRING>Flavor name m1.POWER</STRING> </attribute> </Kind> </Category>

<Category xmlns="urn:xmpp:occi-representation"> <Mixin> <term>openstackimage</term> <schema>http://schema.cit.tu-berlin.de/occi/openstack/compute#</schema> <title>f5036ba0-429a-4dfb-9abc-3c7399c319bf</title> <attribute name="openstack.image.name"> <STRING>Ubuntu GUI Client</STRING> </attribute> <attribute name="openstack.image.mindisk"> <INTEGER>40</INTEGER> </attribute> <attribute name="openstack.image.minram"> <INTEGER>0</INTEGER> </attribute> </Mixin> </Category>
